description: A charming story set in Britain, where a chocolate expresses its affection with a tea-themed compliment on Valentine's Day.
title: Tea-riffic Love
n_1: In a quaint British teashop, Choco was preparing a special surprise for Tea-Cup.
c1_1: Tea-Cup, I have something sweet to say...
n_2: Choco, with a bashful smile, shared his heartfelt feelings.
n_3: Tea-Cup blushed, her steam swirling in delight.
c1_3: Will you be my Valentine, Tea-Cup?
c2_3: Yes, Choco! You make my heart brew!
n_4: And so, amidst the cozy teashop setting, Choco and Tea-Cup celebrated their love, tea-riffically sweet.
